description: clean, safe, beautiful, fully furnished, private - air conditioning, wifi, laundry -cable tv- only 3 blocks from subway and only 4 stops to Times Square - 2 person bed, 2  person sofa bed, 2 person air bed upon request -  great restaurants nearby-- private apartment - fully furnished -- sheets, towels, everything.  caretaker to help you with your bags - storage room in basement if you need to check in early or stay late - 100's of amazing five star reviews over past few years of original listing
name: Beautiful Harlem Apartment 3F
review: Everything was perfect, even better than what you can obtain from the pictures. I encourage recommend this place
